i1.name: Sunlight
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Leona's''' [[champion ability|abilities]] mark enemies hit with ''Sunlight'' for {{fd|1.5}} seconds. Subsequent applications of ''Sunlight'' will refresh its duration.
Damage dealt to marked enemies by allied {{tip|champion|champions}} (excluding '''Leona''') consumes ''Sunlight'' to deal {{as|{{pp|25 to 144}}|magic damage}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Leona's champion ability mark enemies hit with Sunlight for 1.5 seconds. Subsequent applications of Sunlight will refresh its duration.
Damage dealt to marked enemies by allied champions (excluding Leona) consumes Sunlight to deal 25undefined âˆ’ 144undefined (based on level) bonus magic damage.
i1.notes:
* ''Sunlight's'' mark damage is credited to the allied champion and not to '''Leona'''.
** The damage will benefit from allies' {{sti|magic penetration|{{as|magic penetration}}}} and will apply any [[Ability effects|spell effects]] and {{stil|spell vamp}} they have.
** {{Pending for test}}: [[Omnivamp]]
* {{ci|Zyra}} has a hidden passive that grants her 10% increased size for {{tt|33 seconds|Estimated}} after having ''Sunlight'' applied to her.

q1.name: Shield of Daybreak
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Leona''' illuminates her shield, causing her next [[basic attack]] within 6 seconds to have a {{fd|0.25}}-second cast time, gain {{sti|range|50 '''bonus''' range}}, deal {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} and {{tip|stun}} the target for 1 second.
''Shield of Daybreak'' {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Leona's''' basic attack timer.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Leona illuminates her shield, causing her next basic attack within 6 seconds to have a 0.25-second cast time, gain 50 bonus range, deal bonus magic damage and stun the target for 1 second.
Shield of Daybreak resets Leona's basic attack timer.
q1.notes:
* The enhanced attack will apply other {{tip|on-hit}} effects and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal.
** {{tip|critical strike|Critical strikes}} do not interact with ''Shield of Daybreak's'' bonus damage.
** ''Shield of Daybreak's'' bonus damage will apply to {{tip|turret|turrets}} only and no other [[structures]].
* {{Pending for test}}: ''Shield of Daybreak's'' interactions with {{tip|dodge|dodging}}, {{tip|block|blocking}}, and {{tip|blind|blinding}} effects.
* ''Shield of Daybreak's'' attack does not put '''Leona's''' basic attack on cooldown.{{bug|2}}
** This effectively performs a second {{tip|basic attack reset|attack reset}}.
** This is unlike other empowered attacks (including those which, similar to ''Shield of Daybreak'', use a more unconventional spell cast rather than an attack override).
** '''Leona''' will wait out ''Shield of Daybreak's'' wind-down before automatically attacking, anyway. The player must issue the next attack themselves to gain the full benefit of the second reset.
q1.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '{{tt|5|Starts post-effect}}' as '5/0' and riot's value '5,5,5,5,5' as '5'

effects.str: • Bonus Magic Damage: (+ 30% AP)

w1.name: Eclipse
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Leona''' radiates a solar eclipse around herself for 3 seconds, gaining {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' armor}}}} and {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' magic resistance}}}} and taking {{tip|Damage reduction|reduced}} {{tt|pre-mitigation damage|Damage calculated before modifiers}} from every instance of damage, up to a maximum of 50% reduction.

The eclipse then detonates after the duration, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all nearby enemies and granting '''Leona''' ''Eclipse's'' damage reduction and '''bonus''' resistances for an additional 3 seconds if she hits an enemy.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Leona radiates a solar eclipse around herself for 3 seconds, gaining bonus armor and bonus magic resistance and taking reduced pre-mitigation damage from every instance of damage, up to a maximum of 50% reduction.
The eclipse then detonates after the duration, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies and granting Leona Eclipse's damage reduction and bonus resistances for an additional 3 seconds if she hits an enemy.
w1.notes:
* Neither the cast nor detonation of ''Eclipse'' interrupts any of '''Leona's''' previous orders or ongoing attack windups.
* The resistance scaling will factor from all other sources, excluding ''Eclipse's'' flat bonus. This will recalculate over the duration.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the damage but ''Eclipse's'' extended duration will not be prevented.
w1.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '{{tt|{{ap|14 to 10}}|Starts on-cast}}' as '0/12.667/11.333/10/8.667/0' and riot's value '14,13,12,11,10' as '14/13/12/11/10'

effects.str:
• Flat Damage Reduction:

  • Bonus Armor: (+ 20% bonus armor)

  • Bonus Magic Resistance: (+ 20% bonus magic resistance)

e1.name: Zenith Blade
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Leona''' projects a solar image of her sword in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies hit.
If she hits at least one enemy champion, she will {{tip|dash}} 225 units behind the last one struck within 3000 range and {{tip|root}} them for {{fd|0.5}} seconds.
'''''Leona''' is unable to move or attack while Zenith Blade is in flight.''
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Leona projects a solar image of her sword in the target direction, dealing magic damage to all enemies hit.
If she hits at least one enemy champion, she will dash 225 units behind the last one struck within 3000 range and root them for 0.5 seconds.
Leona is unable to move or attack while Zenith Blade is in flight.
e1.notes:
* '''Leona''' will be ordered to basic attack the target.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the ability but not the {{tip|dash}} if being the last target hit.
* '''Leona''' will fail to {{tip|root}} or {{tip|dash}} to the target if it becomes {{tip|untargetable}} after being struck or is not within 3000 range.
* ''Zenith Blade's'' missile is fired from wherever '''Leona''' is at the end of the cast time.

r1.name: Solar Flare
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Leona''' calls down a beam of solar energy which strikes upon the target location after {{fd|0.625}} seconds, granting {{tip|sight}} of the area before impact and for another 3 seconds afterwards. Enemies within the area are dealt {{as|magic damage}} upon impact.
Enemies struck are {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 80% for {{fd|1.5}} seconds, and are also {{tip|stun|stunned}} for the same duration if they are hit by the epicenter.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Leona calls down a beam of solar energy which strikes upon the target location after 0.625 seconds, granting sight of the area before impact and for another 3 seconds afterwards. Enemies within the area are dealt magic damage upon impact.
Enemies struck are slowed by 80% for 1.5 seconds, and are also stunned for the same duration if they are hit by the epicenter.
r1.notes:
* ''Solar Flare's'' visual effects are only visible to enemies if they have {{tip|sight}} of the area it was cast upon.
* The cast indicator shows 300 radius for the [[area of effect]] and 120 radius for the epicenter, however the actual hitbox radii are larger than those values.
* The revealed radius is not obstructed by [[terrain]] or {{tip|brush}}.
